Load Summary Data

Source: R/data_loaders.R, R/scrape_fbref_direct.R
load_summary.Rd

Loads player summary statistics from pannadata. Uses DuckDB to query parquet files - filtering happens at query time.

Usage

load_summary(league = NULL, season = NULL, source = c("remote", "local"))

load_summary(league = NULL, season = NULL, source = c("remote", "local"))

Arguments

league

League code (e.g., "ENG"). NULL for all leagues.

season

Season string (e.g., "2023-2024"). NULL for all seasons.

source

"remote" (default) downloads from GitHub releases using DuckDB, "local" reads from local pannadata_dir().

Value

Data frame of player summary statistics.

Data frame of player summary stats or NULL

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Load all summary data from remote
all_summary <- load_summary()

# Load England 2023-2024 only (efficient - filters in SQL)
eng_2023 <- load_summary(league = "ENG", season = "2023-2024")

# Load from local files
local_data <- load_summary(source = "local")
} # }
if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Load from GitHub releases (default, efficient with SQL filtering)
load_summary("ENG", "2024-2025")
load_summary("ENG")
load_summary(season = "2024-2025")
load_summary()

# Load from local files
load_summary("ENG", "2024-2025", source = "local")
} # }
